name: Foodwerkz
overview:
Foodwerkz is a location based mobile application that allows food lovers to browse & review food in real time. Users will be able to share their reviews with their friends through their social networks and emails, enabling them to get the best food recommended by their peers.

Foodwerkz strive to simplify the choosing process for their users by being more visual-focus for the reviews. Every dish review is accompanied with a photograph of the food, migrating from a text-based communication method to a richer imagery alternative. Points will be awarded to users for each good contribution they have made and accumulation of these points will earn them badge recognitions and other incentives. The point system will encourage content contributions from the users and make the user experience more fun and interactive.
